page.title: 05Children's Games.
page.content: A{survey}conducted in{June 1985 discovered that children play an amazing variety of games at home and school.There are too many to list here,but we found that{school games can be sorted into{five categories. {a)Sporting.}eg.football,leapfrog,1-2-3 up.{b)T.V.}(adapted from a T.V. programme) e.g. StreetHawk,Airwolf {c)Imaginary.}e.g. Robots and Daleks, shops,cops and robbers{d)Tig Games. stuck in the mud,blog 123,Bog monster. {e)Others.}Breakdancing,Lifeboats,Cats got the measles. The{younger children}enjoy more {imaginary,dramatic}games such as mums and dads,whereas the{older juniors prefer more{sporting activities, particularly ball games. The most{popular}home games proved to be{computer}games,eg.Frogger,StarWars and{board games,}eg. chess.
